overview: Coach Michael Taylor is President and CEO of Creation Publishing Group which is a company that designs and implements personal development programs specifically for men. Through a series of seminars, books, audio programs, videos and a radio show, he fulfills his mission of empowering men to live extraordinary lives. His programs and products support men in creating healthy relationships, dynamic health, financial abundance and deeply rewarding spiritual connections. His commitment is in supporting men in living the life of their dreams.
